caption.p: Receiver operating characteristic curves showing the performance of the XGBoost model (AUC 0.842, 95% CI 0.749 to 0.928), RF (AUC 0.809, 95% CI 0.629 to 0.891) and LR (AUC 0.701, 95% CI 0.573 to 0.825) for predicting 30-day mortality in critically ill influenza patients. AUC, area under the curve; LR, logistic regression; RF, random forest; XGBoost, extreme gradient boosting.
